messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a pack of energy draining parasites have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a horde of energy draining parasites have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Due to the fact centcom said to me we need more dakka they sent me a prototype emmiter to install

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: CHRISTOPHER if you wont give me the pizza i will allow  to kill you from none

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Service.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.
